mireka.filter.local

Class LookupDestinationFilter

  • Object
    • mireka.filter.local.LookupDestinationFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FilterType

    public class LookupDestinationFilter
extends Object
implements FilterType
    The LookupDestination filter assigns a destination to recipients in the FilterBase.verifyRecipient(RecipientContext) phase. It resolves aliases, so the destination set is never AliasDestination. It does nothing if a destination is already assigned, except if it is an AliasDestination, in which case it tries to resolve the alias.
